raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I noticed that in all 4 data sets, there are more players of color than Head coaches of color. Also that the peak of amount of Head coaches of color is in 2020 for the Major League Soccer.
What do you wonder?
What is the data regarding this in 2021 so far? 
What impact does this have on you and your community?
It shows the diversity in our national sports teams. And should make us wonder why is there less Head coaches of color than players?
What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
Does the Sport determine the diversity of a team and coach?
ace_sentences: In all 4 data sets, there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
In Major League Soccer, the number of head coaches of color reaches a peak in 2020.
I wonder about the data for 2021 so far.
The data shows diversity in national sports teams.
The data should make us wonder why there are fewer head coaches of color than players of color.
The headline is: Does the sport determine the diversity of a team and a coach?
